meanings: wait, hold on, (informal) hang on, (예정된 일·사람 등을) expect, (formal) await, (고대하다) look forward to
레스토랑 SOS I can't wait any longer.

meanings.meaning: have nothing to do but[except] wait

examples.korean: I’ll wait until they arrive. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 그들이 도착할 때까지 기다릴 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ll wait until they arrive. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘I’ll wait,’ he said with a sigh. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “난 기다릴 거야,” 그가 한숨을 쉬며 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘I’ll wait,’ he said with a sigh. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There is nothing we can do except dig in and wait. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 꾹 참고 기다릴 밖에 우리가 할 수 있는 일이 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
